name: Salads
description: Discover our collection of composed salads. From delicate starter greens to robust entrée creations that satisfy completely. We can help you create your own perfect combination choosing from a variety of greens, vegetables, fruits and cheeses. For entree salads choose your protein from, chicken, beef, seafood and tofu.

name: Desserts
description: An indulgent selection of artfully crafted desserts—ranging from multi-layered signature cakes and bespoke crepe creations to elegant cheesecakes, rustic galettes, and timeless classics reimagined.

items.name: Mini Dessert Platter
items.description: Assortment of bite-sized desserts

items.name: Tiered Celebration Cakes
items.description: Custom multi-layer cakes in flavors like Red Velvet, Carrot, Banana, Coffee, and Lemon, with fillings including vanilla bean custard, fruit compotes, chocolate, mousse, and more.

items.name: Tailored Layer Cake
items.description: Your bespoke layered cake — crafted to your flavor preferences. Inquire for our curated selections.

items.name: 12-Layer Chocolate Cake
items.description: Decadent chocolate cake with alternating layers of ganache and cocoa cream.

items.name: Strawberry & Cream Cake
items.description: Vanilla sponge with strawberry compote, whipped cream, and custard.

items.name: Banana Toffee Crunch Cake
items.description: Banana sponge with toffee filling, caramel cream, and praline crunch.

items.name: Birthday Cake Funfetti
items.description: Classic vanilla with sprinkles, cream cheese or marshmallow frosting.

items.name: Coconut Lotus Chocolate Cake
items.description: Rich chocolate with coconut shavings and Lotus spread frosting.

items.name: Olive Oil Lemon Basil Cake
items.description: Fragrant olive oil sponge with lemon curd and basil cream.

items.name: Tiramisu Crêpe Cake
items.description: Espresso-soaked crêpes layered with mascarpone cream.

items.description: Crêpes layered with milk tea pastry cream, a boba-inspired favorite.

items.name: Chocolate Mocha Crêpe Cake

items.description: Silky baked cheesecake with optional fruit or chocolate toppings.

items.description: Light and creamy mousse-style cheesecake with seasonal fruit compote.
